name: Bounce Noosa
description:
A brand new property that has opened it's doors in September 2021.  Bounce is an award-winning brand and the new Noosa resort is no exception.

Bounce Noosa is an accommodation hybrid featuring both deluxe hotel suites and premium shared rooms. This unique combination means we are the perfect choice for groups of friends, couples and solo travellers wanting to explore the beauty of Noosa.
The effortless sleek and modern design of this resort with beach club-style relation, will bring guests a one-of-a-kind accommodation experience seriously - you'll never want to leave!

There are several room choices on offer, luxurious queen hotel suites and spacious shared rooms, all with air-conditioning. The centre of the property features a glass edged pool and outdoor bar, where you can spend your days relaxing poolside on our sun loungers and evenings at our beach-club style bar. 

Our location: we are located just one block back from the bustling Noosa River Foreshore, where you can rent paddle boards and kayaks and explore all the amazing food options on Gympie Terrace. IMPORTANT: Please note we are a 7-minute drive from Noosa Main Beach, we offer a three time daily shuttle drop to Noosa Main Beach which is free for all guests to use. We also offer pickups from the Greyhound stop - you will be emailed 24hrs before check-in with details on how to book. 

Whether you are simply keen to lap up those riverside vibes, hit the famous white sandy beaches, get adventurous out on the water, or simply hang by the dreamy pool that oozes beach club-vibes - Bounce Noosa will provide the perfect getaway for those looking for some coastal chill.

Check-in: 2pm
Check-out: 10am 

Booking & Payment Policies:
-Your credit card details have been collected to secure your reservation only and you will be required to pay all accommodation upon arrival.
-You may pay with MasterCard, Visa or cash at the property. Please note a 1% surcharge is applicable on all card transactions.
-The number of nights pre-booked must be paid for on arrival.
-Once checked-in, your reservation is non-refundable. 
-All taxes are included within the room rate.
-You must present a valid passport or driver's license at check-in, failure to do so may result in cancellation of your booking.
-Please note we are strictly an 18+ property 

Group bookings
Please note bookings of 4+ more guests are considered a group booking and fall under separate terms & conditions. You will be contacted shortly after booking by the property with a group booking form and the terms & conditions. 

Cancellation Policies:
-In the event of a no-show or cancellation within 24 hours of your arrival your credit card will be charged 1 night's rate per person, this is non-refundable.
-Any changes to your reservation must be agreed with the property prior to checking in.
-If you do not arrive for your reservation, your reservation will be cancelled.

We have a licensed bar on site, and so you may not consume your own alcohol in the property at any time. Failure to comply to this will result in immediate removal from the property.

houseRules.notes:
Check-in: 2pm
Check-out: 10am 

Booking & Payment Policies:
-Your credit card details have been collected to secure your reservation only and you will be required to pay all accommodation upon arrival.
-You may pay with MasterCard or Visa at the property. Please note we do not accept cash. 
-The number of nights pre-booked must be paid for on arrival.
-Once checked-in, your reservation is non-refundable. 
-All taxes are included within the room rate.
-You must present a valid passport or driver's license at check-in, failure to do so may result in cancellation of your booking.
-We have a strict over 18 policy only across the entire property.
-All guests must be between 18-35 years of age to stay in dorm accommodation. Guests over the age of 35 are welcome to book private rooms or entire dorm rooms. 

Cancellation Policies:
-In the event of a no-show or cancellation within 24 hours of your arrival your credit card will be charged 1 night's rate per person, this is non-refundable.
-Any changes to your reservation must be agreed with the property prior to checking in.
-If you do not arrive for your reservation, your reservation will be cancelled.

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR
The full remaining cost of any booking for stays between the 22nd of December and the 9th of January (inclusive) must be paid at the time of booking. You will be contacted shortly after booking with further details from Bounce Noosa. Payment can be made by bank transfer or the credit card nominated at the time of booking. Failure to respond to Bounce Noosa's communications within 7 days after booking your booking will be cancelled. All bookings that have not been prepaid by the 1st of December will be cancelled.

Please note that should you wish to alter the booking at all, this will only be possible before the 1st of December.

We have a licensed bar on site, and so you may not bring in your own alcohol to the property at any time. Failure to comply to this will result in immediate removal from the property.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
